challenges.name: Calculator
challenges.author: modeluser
challenges.desc: Test and implement a simple command line based calculator.

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Test multiplication
tasks.desc:
Write a JUnit test case that tests the multiplication method for two integers. 
Method should take two integers as arguments and return the product of those as an integer.

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Make multiplication test pass
tasks.desc:
Write code that makes the given test pass.
Method should take two integers as arguments and return the product of those as an integer.

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Test addition
tasks.desc:
Write a JUnit test case that tests the addition method for two integers. 
Method should take two integers as arguments and return the sum of those as an integer.

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Make addition test pass
tasks.desc:
Write code that makes the given test pass.
Method should take two integers as arguments and return the sum of those as an integer.

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Test division
tasks.desc:
Write a JUnit test case that tests the division method for two integers. 
Method should take two integers as arguments and return the quotient of those as an integer.

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Make division test pass
tasks.desc:
Write code that makes the given test pass.
Method should take two integers as arguments and return the quotient of those as an integer.

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Test subtraction
tasks.desc:
Write a JUnit test case that tests the subtraction method for two integers. 
Method should take two integers as arguments and return the difference of those as an integer.

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Make subtraction test pass
tasks.desc:
Write code that makes the given test pass.
Method should take two integers as arguments and return the difference of those as an integer.

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Test Hello World
tasks.desc: Write a JUnit test case for a method that takes no arguments and returns "Hello, world!" as a string.

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Implement Hello World
tasks.desc: Write a method that makes the given test pass

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Test even numbers checker
tasks.desc: Write a test for a method that checks if the argument is an even integer

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Implement even numbers checker
tasks.desc: Implement a method that checks if the argument is an even integer.

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Moomins test
tasks.desc: Write a test for a method that returns true if the string argument contains the word "muumi".

tasks.author: modeluser
tasks.name: Moomins
tasks.desc: Write a method that returns true if the argument contains the word "muumi".
